price: 51. Y si hubiésemos querido, habríamos enviado un amonestador a cada ciudad.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
